school_main_chara_rival_02:
I’m making my Pokémon some food!\c
Y’know, I think “a tablespoon” means different
amounts to different people...[VAR 0114(0004)]
school_main_chara_friend_02:
Mabosstiff is still doing great—thanks to all the
hard work you and me put in, ’course![VAR 0114(0006)]
school_main_chara_botan_02:
Doesn’t get any better than chilling in my room
with my Veevees. Feel free to stay awhile![VAR 0114(0008)]
school_main_chara_headteacher_01:
If you ever need help with any school-related
matters, I shall be happy to lend an ear.[VAR 0114(000A)]
school_main_chara_headteacher_02:
I’m so glad that you came to [VAR 1107(00FF,0206)]NaranjUva Academy,
M[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0305)]asteriss [VAR TRNAME(0000)].[VAR 0114(000A)]
school_main_chara_battleteacher_01:
Osu, new kid! Muscles sure are great, don’t
you think?[VAR 0114(0024)]
school_main_chara_battleteacher_02: Osu, new kid! Are you getting your training in?[VAR 0114(0024)]
school_main_chara_mathteacher_01:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Hello, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]. Feel free to
come\r
ask\r
me\r
questions\r
anytime.[VAR 0114(0025)]
school_main_chara_mathteacher_02:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Oh, if it isn’t [VAR TRNAME(0000)]. I’m glad
that\r
you\r
seem\r
to\r
be\r
doing well.[VAR 0114(0025)]
school_main_chara_historyteacher_01:
Taking time out of your day to attempt to
converse with me? You must be absolutely mad.[VAR 0114(0027)]
school_main_chara_historyteacher_02:
[VAR BD06(0000)]You are quite the interesting pupil,
[VAR TRNAME(0000)].[VAR 0114(0027)]
school_main_chara_historyteacher_03:
I am still investigating that old...fairy tale. You
must await further reports from me.[VAR 0114(0027)]
school_main_chara_historyteacher_04:
I do hope you will take on the hunt for the
treasures of ruin if you are so inclined.[VAR 0114(0027)]
school_main_chara_historyteacher_05:
How are the treasures of ruin faring?\c
If you ever find them too much to handle, I will
gladly take them off your hands.[VAR 0114(0027)]
school_main_chara_healthteacher_01:
Are you tired? Why not lie down and have a
quick rest?[VAR 0114(0028)]
school_main_chara_healthteacher_02:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Oh heyyy, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]! Don’t
work\r
too\r
hard\r
out\r
there.\r
Rest\r
is\r
important, too![VAR 0114(0028)]
school_main_chara_hometeacher_01:
Please feel free to relax and unwind if you wish.
No need to concern yourself with me.[VAR 0114(0029)]
school_main_chara_hometeacher_02:
If you know of anywhere with exceptional sweets,
I would very much appreciate that information.[VAR 0114(0029)]
school_main_chara_pokelogicalteacher_01:
Hello, hello. Have you been out there catching
lots of Pokémon?[VAR 0114(002A)]
school_main_chara_pokelogicalteacher_02:
Aim to register 30 Pokémon species in your
Pokédex! Come tell me when you’re done, OK?[VAR 0114(002A)]
school_main_chara_pokelogicalteacher_03:
Aim to register 100 Pokémon species in your
Pokédex! Come tell me when you’re done, OK?[VAR 0114(002A)]
school_main_chara_pokelogicalteacher_04:
Aim to register 200 Pokémon species in your
Pokédex! Come tell me when you’re done, OK?[VAR 0114(002A)]
school_main_chara_pokelogicalteacher_05:
Aim to register 400 Pokémon species in your
Pokédex! Oh, and when you do complete it...\c
Press the [VAR COLOR(0006)]X Button[VAR COLOR(0000)] in your Pokédex app and you
can get yourself a nice little completion mark!\r
I’d love you to come show me when you get it.[VAR 0114(002A)]
school_main_chara_pokelogicalteacher_06:
I hope you’ll keep looking for new Pokémon to
befriend here in Paldea![VAR 0114(002A)]
school_main_chara_languageteacher_01: Waouh! Thanks for coming to say bonjour![VAR 0114(0026)]
school_main_chara_languageteacher_02:
[VAR BD06(0000)]My dear [VAR TRNAME(0000)]! Let’s
communiquer\r
a\r
bit—\r
communicate,\r
that is![VAR 0114(0026)]
school_main_chara_languageteacher_03:
Pawmi se rétablit bien—is recovering well, that is.
Slowly but surely![VAR 0114(0026)]
school_main_chara_languageteacher_04: Pawmi’s doing great! It’s just a bit of a quiet one![VAR 0114(0026)]
school_main_chara_languageteacher_05:
Pawmi’s never been better! How’s that Meowth I
entrusted to your care?\c
Doing su-PURR-bly, I hope?[VAR 0114(0026)]
school_main_chara_artteacher_01:
Ah, you must be a new student! It is a pleasure
to meet you, indeed![VAR 0114(0012)]
school_main_chara_artteacher_02:
Challenging the Gyms is important, of course,
but one must not neglect their studies![VAR 0114(0012)]
school_main_chara_artteacher_03:
What is the true meaning of ”strength,”
I wonder?[VAR 0114(0012)]
school_main_chara_artteacher_04:
... ... ...
... ... ...\c
Oh! I’m so sorry. I was lost in thought.[VAR 0114(0012)]
school_main_chara_artteacher_05:
Hello there, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]!
Please, stay for as long as you wish![VAR 0114(0012)]
